item.title: RT Jacob Lee: Happy holidays to the @LangChainAI 🦜🔗 community! As we wind down the year, I’d like to thank the following folks for contribution...
item.description:
RT Jacob Lee
Happy holidays to the @LangChainAI 🦜🔗 community!

As we wind down the year, I’d like to thank the following folks for contributions to the JS/TS repo the last two weeks during big structural changes 🛠️!

♊️ @alexalx13 for adding @Google Gemini support via AI studio

(1/10)
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 🪩RAG Tutorial from Oracle Generative AI Chatbot using LLaMA-2, @qdrant_engine, RAG, LangChain & @streamlit Really detailed blog post walking throug...
item.description:
🪩RAG Tutorial from Oracle

Generative AI Chatbot using LLaMA-2, @qdrant_engine, RAG, LangChain & @streamlit

Really detailed blog post walking through ingestion, setting up a chain, and making it look great in the UI

Blog: https://blogs.oracle.com/ai-and-datascience/post/ai-chatbot-llama2-qdrant-rag-langchain-streamlit
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Carly Richmond: I had a lot of fun generating Christmas songs using @LangChainAI, #elasticsearch and LLMs. Check out how here: https://discuss.elas...
item.description:
RT Carly Richmond
I had a lot of fun generating Christmas songs using @LangChainAI, #elasticsearch and LLMs. Check out how here:

https://discuss.elastic.co/t/dec-24th-2023-en-generating-the-ultimate-christmas-song-with-elasticsearch-and-llms/347313

If you've not been following the Elastic advent calendar (😲) check it out here:

https://discuss.elastic.co/c/elastic-community-ecosystem/advent-calendar/61

Happy holidays everyone! 🎄🥳


David Pilato 🇺🇦🇪🇺🇫🇷: 📣 @CarlyLRichmond wrote 'Generating the ultimate Christmas song with #Elasticsearch and LLMs' for the @elastic #AdventCalendar ▶️ https://discuss.elastic.co/t/347313. 🎅🏼🎄🎁

item.title: RT Misbah Syed: Let’s do a LangChain x AI meetup/event in India! We can have demos, workshops, showcases, basically anything you have worked with @La...
item.description:
RT Misbah Syed
Let’s do a LangChain x AI meetup/event in India!

We can have demos, workshops, showcases, basically anything you have worked with @LangChainAI.

Planning to visit in Jan, and would be awesome to meet some builders and enthusiasts there.

Lemme know if interested👇
item.author: LangChain

item.title: ♊️Gemini API with LangChain @arslanchaos put together an AWESOME notebook showing how to use the Google Gemini API with LangChain. Covers: 💬Text ...
item.description:
♊️Gemini API with LangChain

@arslanchaos put together an AWESOME notebook showing how to use the Google Gemini API with LangChain. Covers:

💬Text Generation
🖼️Image Understanding
🛟Safety Features
🪛Streaming and batch support

Check it out here: https://github.com/ArslanKAS/LangChain-for-LLM-App-Development/blob/master/GeminiPro_with_LangChain.ipynb
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 💬Creating ChatGPT with Your Own Data with Supabase in JavaScript This fantastic article from the community walks through how to create a ChatGPT ex...
item.description:
💬Creating ChatGPT with Your Own Data with Supabase in JavaScript

This fantastic article from the community walks through how to create a ChatGPT experience over your data using LangChain and @supabase

All in JavaScript!

Check it out here: https://dev.to/surajondev/using-chatgpt-with-your-own-data-using-langchain-and-supabase-4k6c
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Ollama: Ollama and @LangChainAI 🦜works well together! In previous posts, @Hacubu from LangChain has built an example client-side app (all local)...
item.description:
RT Ollama
Ollama and @LangChainAI 🦜works well together!

In previous posts, @Hacubu from LangChain has built an example client-side app (all local) that allows you to chat over documents.

The flexibility of being open-source means as a developer you have a choice on the tooling of your… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1738408806609289407
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: 🌠 Azure Cosmos DB Vectorstore 🌠 You can use @Azure Cosmos DB as a vectorstore in @LangChainAI 🦜🔗 JS/TS community 0.0.10! It...
item.description:
RT Jacob Lee
🌠 Azure Cosmos DB Vectorstore 🌠

You can use @Azure Cosmos DB as a vectorstore in @LangChainAI 🦜🔗 JS/TS community 0.0.10!

It’s fully managed and MongoDB-compatible, letting you work with a familiar interface and dev experience.

Thanks @sinedied!

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/vectorstores/azure_cosmosdb
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: 🤗 HuggingFace Chat Wrapper 🤗 You can now use @HuggingFace LLMs in @LangChainAI as chat models! Incredibly, the small Zephyr-7B can...
item.description:
RT Jacob Lee
🤗 HuggingFace Chat Wrapper 🤗

You can now use @HuggingFace LLMs in @LangChainAI as chat models!

Incredibly, the small Zephyr-7B can even power simple agent use-cases. only the most powerful frontier models could do this last year!

S/o @andrewrreed!

https://python.langchain.com/docs/integrations/chat/huggingface
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 💎Automatic LLM Routing with `notdiamond-0001` notdiamond-0001 automatically determines whether to send queries to GPT-3.5 or GPT-4, depending on wh...
item.description:
💎Automatic LLM Routing with `notdiamond-0001`

notdiamond-0001 automatically determines whether to send queries to GPT-3.5 or GPT-4, depending on which model is best-suited for your task

Built by @tomas_hk, they trained notdiamond-0001 on hundreds of thousands of data points… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1738243031403540543

RT Vinit Agrawal
Part 2 of converting a natural language question🗣to a structured query 🐿 that Slack's (@SlackHQ) search knows.

Built with @LangChainAI🤝

to
"from:@jindalish after:2023-12-14 AI Safety"

https://youtu.be/qhFO1hwGqzU

item.title: Good question We are running chat-langchain in production: https://github.com/langchain-ai/chat-langchain Includes an incremental ingest pipeline run ...
item.description:
Good question

We are running chat-langchain in production: https://github.com/langchain-ai/chat-langchain

Includes an incremental ingest pipeline run daily, citing of source quotes, returning retrieved documents, query transformation, chat memory, and streaming


Martin Høst Normark: What are some great productized examples of RAG? @llama_index and @LangChainAI helps with the technical implementation, but there's a lot left on the table to onboard into a product, ingest knowledge, apply potentially different RAG strategies for knowledge bases etc.
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Arsalan Ali: Just explored the entire Gemini API. For now it seems alright. Created a simplified version of the official notebook and used @LangCha...
item.description:
RT Arsalan Ali
Just explored the entire Gemini API.
For now it seems alright.

Created a simplified version of the official notebook and used @LangChainAI to mostly interact with the Gemini models.

Notebook:
https://lnkd.in/djeTk-QM

#LLM #GeminiAI #AI #multimodalAI #Google #langchain
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Suraj Vishwakarma🥑: One of my ambitious article is here🚀 The article is a guide on using ChatGPT over your own data. It covers the following ...
item.description:
RT Suraj Vishwakarma🥑
One of my ambitious article is here🚀

The article is a guide on using ChatGPT over your own data. It covers the following 👇
- Concept
- Setting client and server
- Integrating @Supabase and @LangChainAI

GH repo is provided. Read the article here👇

https://bit.ly/41wxg6g

item.description:
RT João Moura
AI Agents on the cloud plan my next trip! 🤖☁️✈️
I had a lot of fun putting together this post with @Replit and @hwchase17 from @LangChainAI

You can now try this Tricrew of AI Agents yourself (and two other crews) directly on Replit: https://blog.replit.com/crew-ai

item.title: RT Afiz ⚡️: Exciting news for LLM Lovers! 😍😍 @LangChainAI has announced the new langchain_mistralai package today which lets you use Mistral’...
item.description:
RT Afiz ⚡️
Exciting news for LLM Lovers! 😍😍

@LangChainAI has announced the new langchain_mistralai package today which lets you use Mistral’s new hosted API in LangChain!

Read more: https://python.langchain.com/docs/integrations/chat/mistralai
